mapper.insert: /* insertNode : fb_node테이블에 insrt */ INSERT INTO public.fb_node (node_type, parent_id, owner_id, node_name, owner_auth, group_auth, guest_auth, create_on, create_by) VALUES (#{nodeType}, #{parentId}, #{ownerId}, #{nodeName}, #{ownerAuth}, #{groupAuth}, #{guestAuth}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createBy}) RETURNING node_id
mapper.select: SELECT A.file_id AS fileId , A.node_id AS nodeId , A.phy_folder AS phyFolder , A.phy_name AS phyName , A.org_name AS orgName , A.mime_type AS mimeType , A.file_size AS fileSize , A.ext AS ext , A.note AS note , A.width AS width , A.height AS height , A.status AS status , A.create_on AS createOn , A.create_by AS createBy from fb_file A where file_id = #{value}

/* selectFiles : fb_file에서 조회 */ SELECT A.file_id AS fileId , A.node_id AS nodeId , A.phy_folder AS phyFolder , A.phy_name AS phyName , A.org_name AS orgName , A.mime_type AS mimeType , A.file_size AS fileSize , A.ext AS ext , A.note AS note , A.width AS width , A.height AS height , A.status AS status , A.create_on AS createOn , A.create_by AS createBy from fb_file A INNER JOIN fb_node B ON A.node_id = B.node_id where 1=1 AND B.parent_id = #{value} AND status != 'D' order by A.file_id
mapper.insert: /* insertFile : fb_file에 1레코드 추가한다. 새로추가된 id를 셋팅한다 */ INSERT INTO public.fb_file (node_id, phy_folder, phy_name, org_name, mime_type, file_size, ext, note, width, height, status, create_on, create_by) VALUES (#{nodeId}, #{phyFolder}, #{phyName}, #{orgName}, #{mimeType}, #{fileSize}, #{ext}, #{note}, #{width}, #{height}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createBy}) RETURNING file_id
mapper.delete: /** deleteFile : file 1개 삭제 */ delete from public.fb_file where file_id = #{value}
mapper.select: /** countFilesInNode : node안에 있는 파일갯수 */ SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM public.fb_node WHERE node_type = 'F' AND parent_id = #{value}
